title: Is We Dumb? | Rattlesnakes. Yoga Pants. The Prez. Flat Tire.
description:
Remember that one time Joe Pesci made a legit rap video about "bitches that will getcha?" We didn't either. Let's talk about that, your wife walking around Walmart with her vagina accidentally hanging out, feeling like a complete idiot while on the phone with a costumer service representative, funny Ouija board reviews, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!


The number one thing you can do to help us out the gate is to rate, review, and subscribe to Is We Dumb? wherever you listen to podcasts! We truly appreciate your support.


New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST


Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/yo-0Tt2Rlao


Show Links:

Sarah Brett Butt Buds | http://www.sarahbrett.net/

Joe Pesci Rap Video | https://bit.ly/3oxnjl4

Sloth Pizza Unicorn Shower Curtain | https://amzn.to/34t9r3y
